segments.content:
* 💸 [Clerk - Build session-based authentication with React and Express](https://go.clerk.com/HRqsMAP)
* 📣 [Vercel acquires Tremor to invest in open source React components](https://vercel.com/blog/vercel-acquires-tremor): The premium library to build dashboards is now free and open source.
* 👀 [CRA breaks with React 19, and CRA needs deprecation notices](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app/issues/17004): After various community discussions, Create-React-App has been officially deprecated!
* 👀 [Next.js PR - New standalone `experimental.useCache` flag for usage without `dynamicIO`](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/75240)
* 👀 [Next.js PR - New `experimental.slowModuleDetection` flag to report modules that takes a long time to compile](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/75368)
* 👀 [Remix PR - Support for client side `routerContext`](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/pull/12515)
* 🐦 [React Three Fiber v9 in RC, supporting React 19 and Three.js WebGPURenderer](https://x.com/0xca0a/status/1882441755368563114)
* 📜 [DexieJs: Reactive local state in React](https://www.typeonce.dev/article/dexie-js-reactive-local-state-in-react): You might not need a React state management library, the browser provides a built-in reactive IndexedDB. This great article shows how to wire everything (live queries and actions) using modern React 19 features.
* 📜 [Next.js: an honest review](https://beeps.dev/blog/nextjs-an-honest-review): An interesting and quite pragmatic list of pros/cons of using Next.js in production apps.
* 📜 [Why I Won’t Use JSDOM](https://www.epicweb.dev/why-i-won-t-use-jsdom): Recommends testing frontend components in an actual browser, using Vitest Browser Mode and Playwright, instead of a polyfilled Node.js env like JSDOM. The React integration is similar to using React Testing Library.
* 📜 [UX++ and DX++ with Sync Engines](https://www.carlassmann.com/blog/improve-ux-dx-with-sync-engines): Explains why it’s difficult to invalidate queries and implement optimistic UI with React Query, then propose to use a local-first model with Replicache.
* 📜 [Moving on from React, a Year Later](https://kellysutton.com/2025/01/18/moving-on-from-react-a-year-later.html): Feedback on removing React from a server-rendered Rails application, considering JS a handicap.
* 📜 [Server-side React that renders as png, pdf, or interactive webapp](https://swizec.com/blog/server-side-react-that-renders-as-png-pdf-or-interactive-webapp/): Using a search parameter to return a PDF or png in a TanStack Start app.
* 📜 [How to handle multiple concurrent submissions in Remix](https://tigerabrodi.blog/how-to-handle-multiple-concurrent-submissions-in-remix)
* 📜 [Why are React Server Components actually beneficial?](https://tigerabrodi.blog/why-is-react-server-components-actually-beneficial-full-history)
* 📜 [Picking a state management library for a React app used by millions (and why we went with MobX)](https://www.photoroom.com/inside-photoroom/picking-a-state-management-library-why-we-went-with-mobx-)
* 📜 [useAsyncFetcher: How to implement an asynchronous fetch function in a Remix app](https://www.cerbos.dev/blog/useasyncfetcher-implement-asynchronous-fetch-in-remix)
* 📜 [Intro to Formik](https://playfulprogramming.com/posts/formik-intro)
* 📜 [How to build a CMS with React-Admin](https://marmelab.com/blog/2025/01/24/how-to-build-a-cms-with-react-admin.html)
* 📦 [Vercel Next.js SaaS Starter](https://github.com/nextjs/saas-starter): Initially created by Lee Robinson, it’s now an official package maintained by Vercel. You probably don’t need to buy a paid boilerplate.
* 📦 [2n8 - Class-based React store](https://2n8.wstone.uk/): An interesting blend between MobX and Zustand.
* 🎥 [Theo - Why is every React site so slow?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=INLq9RPAYUw)
* 🎥 [Youssef Benlemlih - TanStack Router Full Course](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fpXOT8SNTpY)

segments.content: Reactile is an UI/UX turnkey framework which features an out-of-the-box, intuitive tiling display with workspaces. - 🐦 [Fernando Rojo highlights “newer versions of React Native have a less expensive `<Text>` component”](https://x.com/FernandoTheRojo/status/1882111985661415556): Starting at v0.75+ (not sure), text components with simple string children are much faster.
- 🐦 [React Native at Shopify \- CTO’s perspective](https://x.com/jmwind/status/1882071857098080653): Former Shopify CTO shared a long tweet that completes nicely the recent Shopify blog post. The decision to adopt RN took years. They took a bet on technology and community based on potential, not on the current state.
- 🐦 [iOS App Clip in Expo Router demo](https://x.com/Baconbrix/status/1882141919574360421): This runs native iOS app screens simply by clicking a link, without even installing from the App Store.
- 🐦 [Multiple windows on iPadOS demo](https://x.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1882388170643272130): A new “React Native Factory” feature unlocks new brownfield and multi-window possibilities.
- 📜 [How to build beautiful React Native bottom tabs](https://expo.dev/blog/how-to-build-beautiful-react-native-bottom-tabs)
- 📜 [Introducing React Native Audio API](https://blog.swmansion.com/hello-react-native-audio-api-bb0f10347211)
- 📜 [Over the Air (OTA) updates with Zephyr](https://zephyr-cloud.io/blog/ota-with-zephyr): Gives the possibility for super apps to update their submodules independently.
- 📦 [Polygen \- Run WebAssembly modules in your apps, statically, without interpreting](https://github.com/callstackincubator/polygen): This Callstack package in preview converts Wasm to C and then call it through JSI to deliver great performance.
- 📦 [Hot Updater \- A self-hostable OTA update solution for React Native](https://github.com/gronxb/hot-updater): An interesting alternative to CodePush. Plugins let you decide where to host the JS bundles (S3, Supabase, PostgreSQL).
- 📦 [React Native Windows 0.77](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-windows/releases/tag/react-native-windows_v0.77.0), and [MacOS 0.77](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-macos/pull/2333) should come soon
- 📦 [React Native 0.74.7](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.74.7): End-of-life release, 0.74.x is now out of support.
- 📦 [React Native CSS Animation presets for Reanimated 4](https://github.com/software-mansion-labs/react-native-css-animations)
- 🎥 [Fernando Rojo \- I built a React Native bottom sheet...with SwiftUI?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TFEPTgGJ2iU)

- 🎥 [Simon Grimm \- React Native Animations just got way easier (Reanimated v4)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QgCLSR9EbDc)
- 🎙️ [React Universe On Air 47 \- Mobile Microfrontends With Zephyr Cloud and Re.Pack](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9fHpEngW2lU)
- 🎙️ [RNR 319 \- Shopify goes full throttle on React Native with Mustafa Ali](https://www.reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-319-shopify-goes-full-throttle-on-react-native-with-mustafa-ali)

- 🐦 [Shopify的React Native实践 - CTO视角](https://x.com/jmwind/status/1882071857098080653)：前Shopify CTO发布长推文，对近期Shopify博文形成补充。采用RN的决策历经数年，他们基于技术潜力和社区前景而非现状下注。
- 🐦 [Expo Router的iOS App Clip演示](https://x.com/Baconbrix/status/1882141919574360421)：点击链接即可运行原生iOS应用界面，无需从App Store安装。
- 🐦 [iPadOS多窗口功能演示](https://x.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1882388170643272130)：新"React Native Factory"特性解锁了遗留系统集成和多窗口可能性。
- 📜 [如何构建精美的React Native底部标签栏](https://expo.dev/blog/how-to-build-beautiful-react-native-bottom-tabs)

- 📜 [使用Zephyr实现无线(OTA)更新](https://zephyr-cloud.io/blog/ota-with-zephyr)：使超级应用能独立更新其子模块。
- 📦 [Polygen - 在应用中静态运行WebAssembly模块](https://github.com/callstackincubator/polygen)：这个Callstack预览版工具将Wasm转为C代码并通过JSI调用以获得卓越性能。
- 📦 [Hot Updater - 可自托管的React Native OTA更新方案](https://github.com/gronxb/hot-updater)：CodePush的替代方案，插件支持自定义JS包托管位置（S3/Supabase/PostgreSQL等）。
- 📦 [React Native Windows 0.77](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-windows/releases/tag/react-native-windows_v0.77.0)，[MacOS 0.77](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-macos/pull/2333)即将发布
